history.proof: intros Phi Hmax x. split. - intros H. unfold maximal, consistent in *. sfirstorder depth: 3. - intros H. apply Hmax in H. unfold maximal, consistent in *. apply Ensembles_ext.Same_set_rel_Reflexive. + sfirstorder depth: 3. + hauto use: @derivable_trans, maximal_consistent_spec unfold: context, consistent. + sfirstorder depth: 3.

original: intros Phi Hmax x. split. - intros H. apply Hmax. unfold maximal, consistent in *. split. + auto. + intros Psi Hcons Hinc. apply Hmax in Hcons. apply Hinc in Hcons. auto. - intros H. apply Hmax in H. unfold maximal, consistent in *. destruct H as [H1 H2]. apply H1.
